titleInfo.title: 'Administration Reports of the Persian Gulf, 1939 to 1944'

physicalDescription.extent: The Reports are bound in chronological order from the front to the rear of the volume. There is a table of contents at the front of each Report.

Foliation: the foliation system in use commences at 1 on the front cover, and continues through to 460 on the back cover. The sequence is written in pencil, enclosed in a circle, and appears in the top right hand corner of the recto page of each folio. Four additional partial foliation sequences are present alongside the main sequence between ff. 72-147, ff. 148-259, ff. 261-356, and ff. 358-455: these numbers are also written in pencil, are circled but crossed out, and can be found in the same position as the main sequence.
